document.getElementById("newPassword"); const verifyNewPassword = document.getElementById("verifyNewPassword"); const verifyNewPasswordSpan = document.getElementById("verifyNewPWErrMsg"); if ( newPassword?.value && verifyNewPassword?.value && newPassword.value === verifyNewPassword.value ) { verifyNewPasswordSpan.innerText = ""; verifyNewPasswordSpan.classList.add("d-none"); return true; } verifyNewPasswordSpan.innerText = "Passwords do not match."; verifyNewPasswordSpan.classList.remove("d-none"); e.preventDefault(); e.stopPropagation(); return false; }; const addEListener = (e) => { // `DOMContentLoaded` has already fired // const verifyNewPassword = document.getElementById("verifyNewPassword"); const submitBtn = document.getElementById("submitBtn"); if (submitBtn) { submitBtn.addEventListener("click", comparePasswords); } return comparePasswords(); }; /** * Wait for page to load to add event listener to submit button */ if (document.readyState === "loading") { // Loading hasn't finished yet document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", addEListener); } else { // `DOMContentLoaded` has already fired const submitBtn = document.getElementById("submitBtn"); if (submitBtn) { submitBtn.addEventListener("click", comparePasswords); } } settings.csp: worker-src 'self' blob:; script-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://code.jquery.com https://devsdk.singularkey.com http://cdnjs.cloudflare.com 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval';

nodeDescription.value: Uses the username received from the first page to look up a user and send a recovery code to that user's email

customHTML.value: Account Recovery

nodeDescription.value: Asks user for their username to begin account recovery

customHTML.value:
Account Recovery

Congratulations, you have successfully completed the account recovery flow!

nodeDescription.value: Page for letting the user know that account recovery was successfully completed

customHTML.value: Account Recovery

nodeDescription.value: Asks user to input the code sent to them so PingOne can validate it
If PingOne can validate the recovery code, the new password is updated on the user's account
PingOne failed to send a recovery code to the email associate with the given username

nodeTitle.value: PingOne couldn't update the user's password

nodeDescription.value: The code entered by the user failed to pass validation by PingOne or the password did not meet the password policy's requirements

annotation.value: Initialize variables for use in the flow
Send code to user's stored email address

nodeDescription.value: Returns the success message and includes the request parameters in JSON

annotation.value: Failed code validation or password reset
Find PingOne Identity by Username and Send Recovery Code

nodeDescription.value: Continue the flow where the successful results are sent in JSON

annotation.value: Find PingOne Identity by Username and Send Recovery Code

nodeDescription.value: Initialize common values used in the flow so that they're easier to update in one place
Error encountered when trying to show the success html page

nodeTitle.value: Error occurred on OTP form page

nodeDescription.value: Error occurred when displaying form page or trying to collect OTP

annotation.value: Failed to collect OTP recovery code

nodeDescription.value: An error occurred on displaying form page or collecting username
Saves username as a flow instance variable
Sends and validates recovery code before updating password

annotation.value: Send and Validate Recovery Code Before Resetting Password
Continue to recovery code and reset password
